title: What is the $GINI token and why is it getting so much attention from crypto investors?
description: Enter $GINI Token, an offering from KALP network ecosystem that caught my attention because it does something pretty clever: it’s getting viral attention like meme coins and but is designed for real-world utility. Think of it as the best of both worlds—the excitement that draws people in, backed by substance that makes them stay.
